imdb.plot outline: A "nutty professor" reviews and revisits the history of medicine from the privacy of his own library and laboratory. This first retrospective begins with a panorama of speculations and superstitions that guided ancient civilizations in their daily confrontation with illness, and concludes with the great revolutions in thought that took place during the Renaissance, transforming the approach and practice of medicine and public hygiene forever.
imdb.title: Las Batallas por la vida: Capítulo I, Del mito a la ciencia
akas: Las Batallas por la vida: Capítulo I, Del mito a la ciencia (Mexico)
plot: A "nutty professor" reviews and revisits the history of medicine from the privacy of his own library and laboratory. This first retrospective begins with a panorama of speculations and superstitions that guided ancient civilizations in their daily confrontation with illness, and concludes with the great revolutions in thought that took place during the Renaissance, transforming the approach and practice of medicine and public hygiene forever.
